quiz.instructions: This quiz contains 20 multiple-choice questions. Each question may have 1, 2, 3, or 4 correct answers. Answer all questions to get your final score. When finished, type 'TERMINER' or 'FIN' to get your score.

questions.questionText: Which Google Cloud service would you use to analyze the real-time location of New York taxis?
How can Cymbal Retail use machine learning to improve customer satisfaction?
Which feature of BigQuery can be utilized for efficient cost management when analyzing large datasets?
What is an advantage of using Dataflow for streaming data processing in New York taxi trip analysis?
In Cymbal Retail, which service can be used for building a data lake for storing and analyzing large volumes of unstructured data?
What is a key benefit of using Cloud Dataprep for preparing data for analysis?
How can BigQuery ML help in analyzing Cymbal Retail's sales data?
Which Google Cloud service is most suitable for creating dashboards to visualize New York taxi trip data?
What is a common use case for Pub/Sub in the context of retail analytics?
Which feature of BigQuery allows for easy querying of nested and repeated fields in JSON data from New York taxi trips?
How can Cymbal Retail use Google Cloud's AI Platform to enhance customer engagement?
What is a primary use case for using Cloud Dataproc in analyzing New York taxi trips?
options: Running Spark jobs for data analysis

questions.questionText: Which Google Cloud service would be best for integrating machine learning models into Cymbal Retail's recommendation system?
What kind of insights can be derived from analyzing geospatial data in New York taxi trips using BigQuery?

What type of analysis can be performed on historical New York taxi trip data using BigQuery?
How can Cloud Dataprep be used in Cymbal Retail's data pipeline?
options: To clean and preprocess sales data

questions.questionText: Which feature of BigQuery is useful for analyzing time-series data from New York taxi trips?
How can Cymbal Retail use BigQuery ML for predictive modeling?
options: By training models on sales data
By integrating with other ML tools
